entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 23.
